references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Letterio Toscano, Sulla Derivata di Ordinen della Funzione tg(x), Tohoku Math. J., 42 (1936), 144-154.
prog: (PARI) a(n, k)=if(k<0,0,if(n==1 && k==1,1,if(k>n,0,(k-1)*a(n-1,k-1)+(k+1)*a(n-1,k+1)))) for(n=0,25,print1(a(n+4, n)",")) - Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Nov 20 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Nov 20 2006
